entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Waterton Park
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:40 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, Waterton Park

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.4°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to periods of light snow in the evening and ending overnight then partly cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023
